translation.en: -Sara Matthews. -Sara Matthews.
You're in Room 316.
-Welcome. -Thank you.
Bad driver. Hey. I'm Tracy.
-Let me help you. -Okay. Oh, thanks.
It's great.
No, Mom, she's not here yet.
translation.fr: Non, maman, elle n'est pas encore là.

translation.en: At least I got to pick my side of the room though.
translation.fr: J'ai pu choisir le lit que je voulais.

translation.en: All right, I'll talk to you later. I love you. Bye.
translation.fr: Oui, à plus tard. Je t'aime fort.

translation.en: Hey. Tau Sigma Kappa's throwing a bash. You have to come.
translation.fr: Fiesta à Tau Sigma Kappa. Viens !

translation.en: -I'm sorry, Tau--? -They're a frat. You know, beer, guys....
You know, I think I'm gonna wait for my roommate.
translation.fr: Je vais plutôt attendre ma coloc.

translation.en: Come on! It's gonna be fun. Me and Kim are coming. Please, please, please.
translation.fr: - Allez, on va s'éclater. - Kim et moi, on y va. Dis oui !

translation.en: All right.
-Cheers. Yes. -College!
Did you see that guy? He's checking you out.
Thank you. We're gonna take a break. Someone get us a beer!
translation.fr: On revient après la pause. Il fait soif !

translation.en: I'm gonna get some more punch. You guys want some?
translation.fr: Je reprends du punch. Ça vous dit ?

translation.en: No, no, no. I'm good.
Oh, no. I am so sorry about that.
I really am sorry.
Whoa, wait. Where you going?
I'm feeling a little dizzy.
Let's find you a seat and I'll grab you a towel.
translation.fr: Viens t'asseoir, je te trouve une serviette.

translation.en: -Here. Here you go. -Thank you.
I'm gonna grab a beer. Do you want one?
Oh, no, thanks. I'm just having punch.
translation.fr: Non, merci. Je reste au punch.

translation.en: That might explain a few things.
We tend to spike the punch.
-You spike it? -Yeah.
-Nice. -When a girl has had three cups....
translation.fr: - Sympa. - Quand une fille a bu trois verres...

translation.en: Four.
If we don't get her up into a room... ...we have to pull kitchen duty for, like, a week.
translation.fr: Si elle passe pas la nuit ici, on a une semaine de corvée de cuisine.

translation.en: I'm gonna go to the bathroom. I have to clean this up.
translation.fr: Je vais aux W.-C. me nettoyer un peu.

translation.en: Plan didn't work. I guess it backfired.
translation.fr: Mon plan s'est retourné contre moi.

translation.en: What plan?
I purposely spilled beer on you to start a conversation.
translation.fr: J'ai renversé ma bière exprès pour te parler.

translation.en: -You purposely spilled beer on me? -Yes, I did.
translation.fr: - Tu as fait exprès ? - Oui, c'est bien ça.

translation.en: Sara! Sara! I think you better come here.
-Is she a friend of yours? -Yes.
Take it off! Take it off! Take it off!
Tracy!
Shit.
...I got her. Get off of her. Get off her!
-Yeah, who's got you? -I guess that would be me.
translation.fr: - Et toi, qui te tient ? - Moi, on dirait.

translation.en: Yeah? Who's got you?
Apparently, God.
-You okay, Kim? -Yeah, yeah.
-Oh, God! Oh, God! -Okay, here we go.
Should we ride the elevator?
-All I had was punch. -Here we go.
translation.fr: On prend l'ascenseur ? J'ai bu que du punch.

translation.en: -You got her? -Thanks, Sara. Okay.
Hey, you're that cute drummer guy from that shitty band. Oh, you're hot.
translation.fr: T'es le batteur mignon du groupe merdique. T'es canon.

translation.en: You know, I'm gonna get yelled at for helping girls actually leave a frat party.
translation.fr: Je vais me faire pourrir pour avoir aidé des filles à partir.

translation.en: It's kind of like the opposite of everything we stand for.
You know?
Good night.
-Wait. -No, keep it. Save it till next time.
translation.fr: Attends. Garde-le jusqu'à la prochaine fois.

translation.en: I'm sorry about kitchen duty. I was just bullshitting you.
translation.fr: - Désolée pour la corvée de cuisine. - Je déconnais.

translation.en: -Who are you? -I'm your roommate, Rebecca.
Rebecca?
You met me last night.
Right.
Starts with an R.
Here, take these. It'll help.
I didn't throw up on you, did I?
Did you draw those?
-Very cool. -Thank you.
Come on. Let's hit the bookstore. The walk will help your head.
translation.fr: Allons à la librairie. L'air te fera du bien.

translation.en: It's too early for me. It's 3:00 in the afternoon.
translation.fr: - Il est trop tôt. - Il est 15 h.

translation.en: Jason, what are you doing?
I just wanted to hear your voice.
-I told you not to do this. -I need to talk to you.
translation.fr: - Je t'ai dit d'éviter. - Je dois te parler.

translation.en: You're just making it harder.
Sara, listen, I wanna come out there.
Yeah, but you didn't, remember? That's the problem.
translation.fr: Je veux venir. Mais tu l'as pas fait. C'est le problème.

translation.en: I gotta go.
That didn't sound good.
Was that your boyfriend?
Ex. It's complicated.
We were supposed to go to college together.
translation.fr: On devait faire la fac ensemble.

translation.en: We both applied to Brown, and I got in but he didn't.
translation.fr: On a demandé Brown, mais il a pas été reçu.

translation.en: And I stuck to our agreement. And we both committed to ULA.
translation.fr: J'ai tenu parole, et on s'est décidé pour ici.

translation.en: And a couple of weeks ago, a spot opens up at Brown, and-- -No. -Yeah.
translation.fr: Il y a quelques semaines, Brown a eu un désistement...

translation.en: -He didn't. -He did.
translation.fr: - Il a pas fait ça ? - Si.

translation.en: What an asshole.
-Do you miss him? -Sometimes I think I do.
translation.fr: Quel connard. Il te manque ? Parfois, je pense que oui.

translation.en: It's hard to let go. Believe me, I know.
translation.fr: Pas facile de lâcher. Crois-moi, je sais.

translation.en: But you're in college now. A girl's gotta move on.
translation.fr: Pas facile de lâcher. Crois-moi, je sais. T'es à la fac, maintenant. Faut tourner la page.

translation.en: -What? -I am so jealous.
Yeah, I'm kind of a clotheshorse.
Actually, can I put some stuff on your side? -No problem. -You can borrow anything you want.
translation.fr: - Je peux en mettre de ton côté ? - Pas de souci.

translation.en: -Some of this I've only seen in Vogue. -My parents' idea of bonding...
translation.fr: - Emprunte ce que tu veux. - Je me crois dans Vogue. Mes parents pensent que l'amour s'achète à Beverly Hills.

translation.en: ...is setting me loose with a platinum card.
translation.fr: Mes parents pensent que l'amour s'achète à Beverly Hills.

translation.en: -You're from here? -Twenty minutes away.
That must be nice. Go home on the weekends, free laundry, free meals.
translation.fr: Veinarde. Week-ends en famille, lessives, repas gratos.

translation.en: -Yeah, not gonna happen. -Why?
Let's just say nothing is free in my house.
What is that?
Oh, it's nothing. It's just some ideas.
-It's good. -Thanks.
Do you mind if I take a look at what you were doing?
translation.fr: Je peux voir ce que tu dessines ?

translation.en: Actually, I do.
It's nothing personal. It's just my process.
translation.fr: Le prends pas mal. Je fonctionne comme ça.

translation.en: I wouldn't want you to look unless it was perfect.
translation.fr: Pas avant que ce soit parfait.

translation.en: Tracy and Kim, this is my roommate, Rebecca.
translation.fr: Tracy et Kim, voici ma coloc, Rebecca.

translation.en: Rebecca. How formal. What can we call you?
-How about Reba? -How about Becca?
How about Becky?
-Becky's good. -Yeah, Becky.
I like Rebecca.
Well, I gotta go, guys. Bye.
"Why should I turn off my BlackBerry to listen to this guy?"
translation.fr: "Pourquoi éteindre mon BlackBerry pour ce type ?"

translation.en: Because this class...
...will make you understand that you're aspiring to do something great.
translation.fr: va réveiller votre envie de faire de grandes choses.

translation.en: To emulate the likes of Marc Jacobs...
...or Vera Wang, Rick Owens... ...perhaps even surpass them.
translation.fr: les Vera Wang, les Rick Owens. Voire de les surpasser.

translation.en: What you create will be considered art... ...and don't let anyone tell you differently.
translation.fr: Vos créations seront de l'art, soyez-en convaincus.

translation.en: The journey starts right here, right now.
And it's my job...
...to make you understand that each of you...
translation.fr: de vous faire comprendre que chacun d'entre vous

translation.en: ...can be artists.
-Professor Roberts? -Yes?
I'm really sorry to bother you. It's just, I must take this class.
translation.fr: Excusez-moi, mais je veux absolument suivre ce cours.

translation.en: I'm sorry, class is full.
Late girl, right? What's your name?
translation.fr: Vous êtes la retardataire ? Votre nom ?

translation.en: Sara Matthews. I brought a request form.
translation.fr: Sara Matthews. J'ai une fiche d'inscription.

translation.en: And why should I sign your form, Sara, when I've turned down a dozen others?
translation.fr: Pourquoi signerais-je la vôtre alors que j'en refuse d'autres ?

translation.en: Would that be fair?
No, I guess it wouldn't.
Don't worry. Intro Design has three other sections.
translation.fr: Il y a trois autres cours de stylisme.

translation.en: That's okay. I'll take it next year.
I wanna take your class. Thank you.
translation.fr: C'est votre cours qui m'intéresse. Merci.

translation.en: You happen to have two things I can't teach...
translation.fr: Vous avez deux choses qui ne s'apprennent pas,

translation.en: ...and that is style and desire.
-Thank you. -You're welcome.
-Don't be late. -I will not be late.
Who is that?
My friend Irene. She graduated from The Art Institute out here last year.
translation.fr: - C'est qui ? - Mon amie Irene. Diplômée d'arts appliqués l'an dernier.

translation.en: She's an artist? She used to be a design consultant for Marc Jacobs.
translation.fr: - Une artiste ? - Elle était styliste chez Marc Jacobs.

translation.en: "Paris was amazing."
"Milan in the fall." And now she's off to Barcelona.
translation.fr: "Paris était génial." "Milan en automne." Et maintenant, Barcelone.

translation.en: Hey. You guys free? We're going to Seven Grand.
-How are we gonna get in? -We're hot.
-You guys in? -Sure.
Clubs aren't really my thing.
translation.fr: Les clubs, c'est pas mon truc.

translation.en: So, what should we wear?
Ladies!
From the two gentlemen at the end of the bar.
translation.fr: De la part de ces deux messieurs.

translation.en: -Let's dance. Yeah. -Can I put these in your bag?
translation.fr: - On danse. - Je peux te laisser ça ?

translation.en: -Watch this guy hit on me. -Yeah.
-How you doing? -Good. What's your name?
translation.fr: Comment va ? - Bien. C'est quoi ton nom ? - Adam.

translation.en: -Adam. -Hi. It's Tracy.
Would you accept a collect call from Sara Matthews?
translation.fr: Acceptez-vous un P.C.V. de Sara Matthews ?

translation.en: Nice car.
-So where's Tracy? -I have no idea.
Well, as long as I'm here....
translation.fr: Quitte à être là... T'as faim ?

translation.en: -You hungry? -I'm starving.
translation.fr: Quitte à être là... T'as faim ? J'ai les crocs.

translation.en: -Me too. -Oh, good.
I can't believe she ran out on you.
translation.fr: Quel culot de te planter là.

translation.en: -Thank you for coming. -Of course. I was up.
translation.fr: - Merci d'être venue. - Je t'en prie. Je dormais pas.

translation.en: -What are you having? -Pancakes.
That's what I was thinking.
You know, tonight Tracy had her shot. Tomorrow you're all mine.
translation.fr: Ce soir, Tracy a eu sa chance. Demain, tu es à moi.

translation.en: I wanna show you the big city the right way. And I promise I won't abandon you.
translation.fr: Visite guidée de la ville. Et promis, je ne t'abandonnerai pas.

translation.en: -Sounds good. Deal. -Good.
These are the modern pieces.
They're a little wilder than the older stuff.
translation.fr: Un peu plus barrées que le reste.

translation.en: This is nice.
It's Jason again.
Come on, I wanna show you something.
translation.fr: J'ai quelque chose à te montrer.

translation.en: This is my favorite.
I love how he captures her personality through her eyes.
translation.fr: On lit toute sa personnalité dans ses yeux.

translation.en: It's like she really wants to help you.
translation.fr: On sent qu'elle veut vous aider.

translation.en: It's amazing. I love it.
I'm so glad you liked it.
translation.fr: Je suis contente que ça t'a plu.

translation.en: -It's not everyone's taste, you know? -Yeah.
translation.fr: C'est pas du goût de tout le monde.

translation.en: That's cool.
What, you don't have graffiti in Des Moines?
translation.fr: Vous n'avez pas de graffitis dans l'Iowa ?

translation.en: Well, yeah. "Lana loves Kevin," "Stacy loves Robert."
But nothing like that.
Smile.
Come on, both of us.
Oh, now that is one art form I don't get.
translation.fr: Voilà un art qui me dépasse.

translation.en: Needles in skin. No, thank you.
translation.fr: Des aiguilles dans la peau, non merci !

translation.en: I have a tattoo.
-No, you don't. -Yeah, I do.
translation.fr: C'est pas vrai ! Si, je t'assure.

translation.en: It's my older sister. She died when I was 9.
translation.fr: Ma grande sœur. Elle est morte, j'avais neuf ans.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
It's okay. This keeps her with me.
translation.fr: T'inquiète. Elle est là avec moi.

translation.en: I always wanted a sister.
Guess who I'm adding as my new favorite artist.
translation.fr: Devine qui je mets comme artiste préféré ?

translation.en: Who?
The Devil Wears Prada is your favorite movie?
translation.fr: The Devil Wears Prada en film préféré ?

translation.en: Yeah, why?
Nothing. It's just not a classic is all.
translation.fr: Rien. C'est juste pas un classique.

translation.en: I know that.
But it is about a small-town girl making it in the fashion world.
translation.fr: Mais ça parle d'une provinciale qui perce dans la mode.

translation.en: -Like you. -Yeah.
Hey there.
Look at you.
Hi, kitty.
No collar, baby?
I thought you'd like it.
I know, I know, I know.
I probably broke about 40 different dorm rules...
...and I should just take it to a shelter, but I just can't.
translation.fr: je devrais l'amener à la SPA, mais je peux pas.

translation.en: What should we name her?
-Really? -It'll be our secret.
translation.fr: - On l'appelle comment ? - Sérieux ? Ce sera notre secret.

translation.en: Well, I kind of already named her. Cuddles.
translation.fr: J'ai déjà un peu choisi un nom. Câline.

translation.en: Sweetie.
Is that my necklace?
Sorry.
I was just trying it on.
It was my sister's.
You can borrow anything of mine except for this.
translation.fr: Emprunte tout ce que tu veux sauf ça.

translation.en: It's the only thing I kept of hers.
translation.fr: C'est tout ce qui me reste d'elle.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
It's okay. You didn't know.
Were you close to her?
You're the first roommate I've had since she died...
translation.fr: J'ai pas partagé ma chambre depuis son décès.

translation.en: ...so it's a little odd.
In a good way or a bad way?
A good way.
Here you go.
Jake, do you mind?
-You wanted a mocha smoothie, right? -Yeah.
Now, there appears to be a pattern forming here.
Just because I kissed you... -...doesn't mean I'll let you cut in line. -Then what does it mean?
translation.fr: - Un baiser n'est pas un passe-droit. - C'est quoi, alors ?

translation.en: Okay, so tonight, the men of Tau Sigma Kappa...
translation.fr: Ce soir, les hommes de Tau Sigma Kappa

translation.en: ...will be reviving a sacred tradition.
A frat party? I don't know.
Thank God. You're going to be my excuse not to go.
translation.fr: Dieu merci. Tu seras mon excuse pour fuir.

translation.en: -Am I gonna get my mocha? -Yes. Can you get him a mocha, please? Thank you.
translation.fr: - Il vient, mon moka ? - Oui. Fais-lui un moka, tu veux ?

translation.en: Yeah. First day.
-All right. Yes. -So I will see you tonight.
-Okay. -Yes, you will. All right.
So Tau Sigma Kappa tonight?
-Kim and I are going. -Why, so you can ditch me again?
translation.fr: - Avec Kim, on y va. - Pour me semer encore ?

translation.en: Sara, the guy had a Porsche and a hot tub.
translation.fr: Le mec avait une Porsche et un jacuzzi.

translation.en: That's your apology?
What I meant to say is I'm sorry. I totally screwed up.
translation.fr: Je voulais dire pardon. J'ai merdé. Pardonne-moi. S'il te plaît.

translation.en: Forgive me? Please?
translation.fr: J'ai merdé. Pardonne-moi. S'il te plaît.

translation.en: I forgive you.
-You look nice. -Thank you.
Richard Prince is having a showing tonight.
translation.fr: L'expo Richard Prince ouvre ce soir.

translation.en: I bought two tickets, since he's your favorite artist.
translation.fr: J'ai deux entrées. C'est ton artiste préféré.

translation.en: I-- I actually have a date.
-I can reschedule. -You don't have to.
translation.fr: - Je peux décaler. - Pas la peine.

translation.en: I want to. Under one condition.
It's cute. Who's the designer?
Who cares? What are you, a label whore?
translation.fr: On s'en fout. T'es accro aux marques ?

translation.en: I'm just curious.
I got it at a flea market for 20 bucks. It's vintage.
translation.fr: Ça vient des puces. Vingt dollars. Du vintage.

translation.en: One more thing.
Perfect.
I am jumping in the shower and then we'll go.
translation.fr: Je me douche vite fait et on y va.

translation.en: Shit.
-I gotta go that way. -Okay. -I'll see you later. Have a good day. -Bye.
translation.fr: Je vais par là. A plus tard. Bonne journée.

translation.en: Listen, something is up with your roommate.
translation.fr: Ecoute, ta coloc est pas nette.

translation.en: What do you mean? She was outside my room this morning.
translation.fr: - En quoi ? - Elle squattait devant ma porte.

translation.en: Doing what?
Waiting for me.
I opened my door and there she was, sitting there staring like some psycho.
translation.fr: J'ai ouvert, elle était là, à me fixer comme une psychopathe.

translation.en: Why would she do that?
You ask her. I'm staying away from her.
translation.fr: - Pourquoi elle ferait ça ? - Demande-lui. Je garde mes distances.

translation.en: Okay. I gotta go.
Contrary to popular opinion...
...beauty is not in the eye of the beholder.
translation.fr: la beauté ne dépend pas de celui qui regarde.

translation.en: It's in the hands of the designer.
Now, tell me, looking at these two options, which one's best?
translation.fr: Lequel de ces deux modèles est le meilleur ? Peut-on avoir faux en mode ?

translation.en: Is there a right or wrong in fashion?
translation.fr: est le meilleur ? Peut-on avoir faux en mode ?

translation.en: Who can tell me the difference between fashion...
translation.fr: Quelle est la différence entre mode et style ?

translation.en: ...and style? Miss Matthews?
translation.fr: De : Irene 5e et Spring. Dépêche. Mlle Matthews ?

translation.en: Fashions fade, but style is eternal.
translation.fr: Les modes passent, le style est éternel.

translation.en: Yves Saint Laurent. Exactly.
All the money in the world can't buy you style.
translation.fr: L'argent ne vous offrira jamais du style.

translation.en: But it can buy you a good stylist.
translation.fr: Il vous offrira un bon styliste.

translation.en: Touché.
How'd you know what time my class... -...got out? -I'm your roommate.
translation.fr: - Tu connais mes horaires ? - Je suis ta coloc.

translation.en: Tracy said something about you scared her.
translation.fr: Tracy dit que tu lui as fait peur.

translation.en: -What? -Yeah.
No. It's more like she scared me.
She was racing to the bathroom like she was gonna hurl. She practically knocked me over.
translation.fr: Elle fonçait comme pour gerber. Elle m'a quasi renversée.

translation.en: Well, the girl does love to party.
Anyway, I wouldn't worry about it.
I gotta go meet Irene. Thanks again for the coffee.
translation.fr: Je vais voir Irene. Merci pour le café.

translation.en: -Irene! -Finally!
-Sit, sit, sit. -Okay.
I so wanna be you when I grow up.
translation.fr: - Je veux être toi, plus tard. - Tu m'étonnes, moi aussi.

translation.en: -Hell, I wanna be me when I grow up. -Irene. Ready?
translation.fr: - Je veux être toi, plus tard. - Tu m'étonnes, moi aussi. - Prête ? - Deux secondes.

translation.en: Two seconds. Your dad keeps leaving me messages. Like, four this week.
translation.fr: - Prête ? - Deux secondes. Ton père me bombarde de messages.

translation.en: I hope you told him I'm closing the library every night.
translation.fr: Dis-lui que je suis un rat de bibliothèque.

translation.en: I told him I haven't seen you. For all I know, you could be a crack ho.
translation.fr: J'ai dit que tu avais sombré dans le sexe et la drogue.

translation.en: -Perfect. -All right, you're done.
-Thank you for coming. -Of course. I wouldn't miss it.
translation.fr: - Merci d'être venue. - J'allais pas rater ça.

translation.en: I haven't seen you around much.
translation.fr: Tu te fais rare, en ce moment.

translation.en: Since you blew me off for dinner and all.
translation.fr: Depuis que tu as annulé notre dîner.

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -Yeah.
Actually, I was thinking maybe dinner tonight?
translation.fr: Justement. Tu veux qu'on dîne ensemble ce soir ?

translation.en: I'm studying, so....
-Oh, I see. -Yeah. Yeah.
-Page 3. -It's very dense.
translation.fr: Page trois. - C'est très dense. - Bien sûr.

translation.en: Right.
All right. All right. Let's go.
-Okay. -Let's go quick... ...before I change my mind.
translation.fr: Mais vite, avant que je change d'avis.

translation.en: Goddamn it.
Hey! How about turning on the light?
I know it's you.
Bitch.
Freak.
You wanna know what I think? I think you're a trashy, little party-going whore.
translation.fr: Tu sais ce que je pense ? T'es qu'une sale petite pute fêtarde.

translation.en: And you are a bad influence on her.
translation.fr: Et t'as une mauvaise influence sur elle.

translation.en: You tell anyone about this and I will kill you.
translation.fr: Si tu parles, je te tue.

translation.en: -Okay. -Nice belly ring.
Hey, it's Sara. Leave a message.
Well, thank you for helping me not study.
translation.fr: Merci de m'avoir aidé à ne pas réviser.

translation.en: Oh, any time.
Where were you?
I kept on calling and calling.
-Rebecca, this is Stephen. -I'm going to bed now.
translation.fr: - Je te présente Stephen. - Je vais me coucher.

translation.en: I'm glad you're okay.
translation.fr: Tant mieux si tu vas bien.

translation.en: -You got a curfew? -No.
I guess she's right. I should have called.
Good night.
-I'll see you later. -Sara.
Last night, I was just worried about you.
You don't need to worry about me. I can take care of myself. Okay?
translation.fr: Pas la peine, je suis une grande fille.

translation.en: -We're good, right? -Yeah, we're good.
-I'm already her best friend? -It's kind of sad.
translation.fr: - Je suis déjà sa meilleure amie ? - C'est triste.

translation.en: Stop it.
Maybe she really likes you.
translation.fr: Peut-être... qu'elle t'aime vraiment beaucoup. Tu vois ?

translation.en: -You know what I mean? -No, I don't.
-I think you do. -You are a moron.
translation.fr: - Je crois que si. - Crétin, va !

translation.en: -Hey. -I heard you changed dorms.
Yeah. Conrad Hall, it seemed like a better vibe, so....
translation.fr: A Conrad Hall, l'ambiance est plus sympa.

translation.en: -We should get together. Grab a bite. -Sara.
What was that all about? I don't know. She just walked off.
translation.fr: - Tu m'expliques ? - Je sais pas. Elle a tourné les talons.

translation.en: Well, she's always been a flake.
-It's not a great view. -No, it's not. It's all right.
It's all right. Yeah. It's about a six out of 10.
-I give it a four. -A four?
That's quite critical of a view.
-So? -So?
Should we--? Should we go home? -Yes, we should. -Yeah.
But the question is:
My place or yours?
-Okay. -Yes, and I'll make you a bet.
A, we go to your place.
B, you take me home...
...to my twin bed and roommate.
translation.fr: à mon petit lit et ma coloc.

translation.en: What's the bet?
This is kind of a stupid bet.
Why did you agree?
Apparently, I'm kind of a stupid guy.
translation.fr: Faut croire que je suis idiot.

translation.en: Oh, don't touch the ground.
Don't touch your feet.
All right, you win.
-So.... -So we go to your place.
translation.fr: - Donc... - Donc on va chez toi.

translation.en: -Wait a second. -What?
Can you give me 30 seconds?
-You're kidding me. -No, I'm not.
Thirty seconds. Thank you.
Almost there.
I'm just gonna have to start taking my clothes off out here.
translation.fr: Je commence à me désaper ici.

translation.en: Yeah, right.
-Oops, there goes my shirt. -I don't believe you.
translation.fr: Hop, adieu le haut ! - Je te crois pas. - Le jean...

translation.en: -There go my jeans. -Damn it, that is my striptease. Stop it.
What's next? Top or bottom?
You know, I'm just gonna make you strip all over again.
I knew you didn't have...
...the guts.
Sara, you answered.
Sara. It's Jason.
Can we talk...
...about us?
I miss you.
You do?
I miss touching you.
Do you miss touching me?
Yes.
Prove it.
I miss you so much.
Don't ever call me again.
What?
-Don't ever call me again. -Wait, Sara, what do you mean? I--
translation.fr: Ne me rappelle jamais. Comment ça ?

translation.en: Good morning.
Hi. You're up early.
Sorry I didn't call. I left my phone.
translation.fr: J'ai pas pu appeler, j'ai laissé mon portable.

translation.en: No problem.
Hello, Cuddles. Hi, kitty.
Do you wanna get some breakfast? Oh, no.
-Is this your cat? -Maybe.
-She's cute. -Thanks.
And if you keep her, I lose my job.
translation.fr: Si tu le gardes, je perds mon boulot.

translation.en: -Do we understand each other? -Yes.
Hey. Come in. What took you so long?
translation.fr: Entre. T'en as mis, du temps !

translation.en: I walked.
-You didn't. -I did. Cabs are too expensive.
translation.fr: - Non ! - Si, les taxis sont trop chers.

translation.en: Sara, you can't just go walking around downtown in L.A. by yourself.
translation.fr: Ne marche jamais à L.A. seule. C'est pas l'Iowa !

translation.en: -This is not Des Moines. -I know.
translation.fr: à L.A. seule. C'est pas l'Iowa ! - Je sais... - Il y a des dingues partout.

translation.en: The city is full of crazies.
translation.fr: - Je sais... - Il y a des dingues partout.

translation.en: Let me make us one drink and then we'll go.
translation.fr: Un petit verre et on y va.

translation.en: Yeah, that's a great idea. Hang on.
-Hey, Irene, do you like cats? -Yeah. Why?
translation.fr: Irene, tu aimes les chats ? - Oui, pourquoi ? - On en donne un.

translation.en: -We need to get rid of one. -I travel too much.
translation.fr: - Oui, pourquoi ? - On en donne un. - Je bouge trop, il mourrait de faim. - Exact. Elle peut pas.

translation.en: -The thing would starve to death. -You're right. No, she can't.
translation.fr: - Je bouge trop, il mourrait de faim. - Exact. Elle peut pas.

translation.en: I'll be home when I'm home.
-Bye. It's all right. -Who was that?
My roommate. She can be overprotective.
That sounds fun.
-So where is it? -Where's what?
translation.fr: Alors, elle est où ? - Où est quoi ? - Tu as parlé d'une surprise.

translation.en: -You said you had a surprise for me? -Oh, yeah.
translation.fr: - Où est quoi ? - Tu as parlé d'une surprise.

translation.en: So I was cleaning out my closet...
translation.fr: J'ai fait du ménage dans mon armoire...

translation.en: ...and I have not worn any of this in the last six months.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas mis ces vêtements depuis six mois.

translation.en: -You're kidding me. All of this? -There's more.
translation.fr: Non ! Tout ça ? C'est pas fini.

translation.en: We don't have a lot of closet space... ...and Rebecca's already taking half my side.
translation.fr: Nos penderies sont petites et Rebecca empiète sur ma partie.

translation.en: Just move in with me.
-Seriously? -Yeah...
...why not? This place is huge. I'm never home.
translation.fr: - Sérieusement ? - Pourquoi pas ? C'est immense et j'y suis jamais. Oublie ta coloc et...

translation.en: Ditch that roommate of yours and live here.
translation.fr: C'est immense et j'y suis jamais. Oublie ta coloc et... viens ici. Les animaux sont admis.

translation.en: Besides, you can have pets.
translation.fr: viens ici. Les animaux sont admis.

translation.en: -I'll talk to her about it. -Good.
Irene really likes the girls.
Always has.
It's too bad she couldn't take Cuddles, huh? That might not be a problem.
translation.fr: - Dommage qu'elle prenne pas Câline. - Il y a peut-être une solution.

translation.en: Really?
She suggested I move in with her.
translation.fr: Elle me propose d'emménager chez elle.

translation.en: What? -You wanna move? -No. I--
I love living here with you.
I'd still technically be living here, so you wouldn't need another roommate.
Her place is huge. It's not like you couldn't use the extra closet space.
translation.fr: C'est immense, chez elle. Pense à la penderie.

translation.en: I don't want more space, I want....
translation.fr: Je pense pas à la penderie, je pense...

translation.en: It's just something to think about.
Nothing's set in stone.
Plus, we'd be able to keep Cuddles.
Yeah, well, I was thinking maybe I'd stay here for Thanksgiving... ...and see you guys at Christmas.
translation.fr: Je peux rester ici à Thanksgiving et passer Noël avec vous.

translation.en: You know what, Mom? I'm really swamped right now. Could I call you guys back? Okay. Bye.
translation.fr: Maman, je suis débordée. Je peux rappeler plus tard ?

translation.en: Feel how nice and warm it is in there?
translation.fr: Tu vois comme il fait bon ?

translation.en: Oh, my God. What's wrong?
-Cuddles got out. -What?
I took her with me to do laundry and she was in the basket...
translation.fr: - Câline est partie. - Quoi ? Je l'ai emmenée à la laverie, elle était dans le panier.

translation.en: ...and she ran off. And I went after her but....
translation.fr: Elle s'est sauvée, je l'ai suivie...

translation.en: I'm sorry.
I'm gonna go find her.
Maybe it's karma. We weren't allowed to keep her anyway.
translation.fr: Affaire de karma ? On devait pas la garder.

translation.en: -It's all my fault. -It was an accident.
translation.fr: - Tout est ma faute. - Mais non.

translation.en: It's just stress after stress, you know?
Is there something else wrong?
My parents really want me to come home for Thanksgiving.
translation.fr: Mes parents veulent que je vienne à Thanksgiving.

translation.en: And you don't wanna go?
Emily died two days before Thanksgiving.
translation.fr: Emily est morte deux jours avant Thanksgiving.

translation.en: It hasn't always been the most festive holiday in the Matthews household.
translation.fr: C'est pas vraiment un jour de fête chez nous.

translation.en: I know I should be there, but, I don't know...
...it's like there's a ghost at the table, you know?
translation.fr: il y a comme un fantôme à table.

translation.en: You can come with me.
Spend Thanksgiving at my house.
-Your folks wouldn't mind? -Please.
Stephen also asked me to stay...
...but thank you.
Midterm designs are due Friday.
Now, remember, people: simplicity.
translation.fr: Rappelez-vous, faites simple. Qui a créé notre métier ?

translation.en: Who is the founder of our industry?
translation.fr: faites simple. Qui a créé notre métier ?

translation.en: Eve. When she handed Adam the fig leaf.
translation.fr: Eve, en donnant une feuille de vigne à Adam.

translation.en: Have a good day.
-Can I see you in my office? -Sure.
I love the danger in your work. It's kinky and edgy.
translation.fr: J'aime vos prises de risque. C'est osé, incisif.

translation.en: I love the fact that there's all these, like, dark recesses in this...
translation.fr: J'adore la noirceur cachée derrière cet aspect innocent. Beau contraste.

translation.en: ...innocent exterior. The juxtaposition is awesome. That's great.
translation.fr: derrière cet aspect innocent. Beau contraste.

translation.en: -Thank you. -And I mean, styles, you know--
translation.fr: - Génial. - Merci. Et les styles changent si vite dans la mode.

translation.en: They change so rapidly in the fashion world.
translation.fr: Et les styles changent si vite dans la mode.

translation.en: Because you got your particular cut, your technique, you know, the--
Which is what makes it so amazing and exciting.
Exactly. Which is why I go to fashion week every year in Paris.
translation.fr: Voilà. Donc, je ne rate jamais la semaine de la mode, à Paris.

translation.en: To catch up on what's fresh and amazing and.... What else?
translation.fr: Je m'imprègne de nouveauté, de sensationnel et...

translation.en: -Exciting. -Exciting.
-And, let's face it, to go to the parties. -Sure.
translation.fr: - Et je fais la fête. - Bien sûr.

translation.en: The budget allows for me to bring an assistant every year.
translation.fr: Le budget permet d'emmener un assistant par an.

translation.en: Usually it's a senior, but not always.
translation.fr: Normalement un 4e année, mais pas toujours.

translation.en: There's a lot of talent in this class...
translation.fr: Il y a des talents dans la classe

translation.en: ...but the best designers push the boundaries on what's acceptable.
translation.fr: mais les meilleurs stylistes repoussent les limites du convenable.

translation.en: They take chances.
I should go.
All right. Well, good meeting.
The offer still stands, Sara.
Chance of a lifetime.
-What's wrong? -My design professor just kissed me.
translation.fr: - Ça va pas ? - Le prof de stylisme m'a embrassée.

translation.en: -Are you all right? -And I think the asshole's married.
translation.fr: - Ça va aller ? - Et ce salaud est marié.

translation.en: -Are you gonna tell Stephen? -No, that'll just cause problems.
translation.fr: - Tu vas le dire à Stephen ? - Surtout pas.

translation.en: I'm here for you.
-I know. -Thank you for telling me.
translation.fr: - Je sais. - Merci de m'en avoir parlé.

translation.en: -What can I do? -Nothing.
translation.fr: - Qu'est-ce que je peux faire ? - Rien.

translation.en: -Professor Roberts? -That's right.
I'm glad you're still here.
Yeah, well, I was just leaving.
-You're not a student of mine. -No, not yet.
translation.fr: - Je ne vous ai pas comme élève. - Pas encore.

translation.en: That's why I'm here.
-I'm failing Intro Psych. -Yeah, and why is that?
translation.fr: - Je me plante en psycho. - Pourquoi ?

translation.en: I'm bored.
Well, I'm real sorry about that, but I don't know what I can do to help.
translation.fr: J'en suis désolé, mais je n'y peux rien.

translation.en: Tomorrow is the last day to drop a course.
translation.fr: Demain, c'est la limite pour arrêter une matière.

translation.en: If I don't add another one in its place, then I'll fall way behind in credits.
translation.fr: Si je la remplace pas, je perds des crédits.

translation.en: Daddy won't take that very well.
He might even pull the plug...
translation.fr: Il pourrait me couper les vivres.

translation.en: ...which means I'm pretty much at your mercy.
translation.fr: Autrement dit, je suis à votre merci.

translation.en: Look, I really don't take--
translation.fr: Ecoutez, je ne prends pas d'étudiants

translation.en: It's not my policy to take on students in the middle of the term.
translation.fr: Ecoutez, je ne prends pas d'étudiants en cours d'année.

translation.en: Do I look like just any student to you?
-Oh, your wife's very pretty. -Oh, it's my ex-wife.
translation.fr: - Votre femme est très belle. - Ex-femme.

translation.en: I might have to ask you a few questions first.
translation.fr: J'aurais des questions à vous poser.

translation.en: -Ask me anything. -You have design experience?
translation.fr: - Tout ce que vous voulez. - Expérience en stylisme ?

translation.en: -None. -What do you know about clothes?
Only one thing.
Yeah, and what's that?
I look better out of them than in them.
translation.fr: Je suis plus jolie sans qu'avec.

translation.en: Well, I think we can work something out.
-Just tell me and I'll do anything. -Kiss me.
translation.fr: - Dites, je ferais n'importe quoi. - Embrasse-moi.

translation.en: -What? -I said kiss me.
Professor Roberts, you're hurting me.
translation.fr: Pr Roberts, vous me faites mal.

translation.en: Oh, you little tease.
Get off of me! Stop it! Stop!
-Quiet! -No!
-Shut up! Quiet! -Get off of me! Stop! Leave me alone!
translation.fr: - La ferme ! - Lâchez-moi ! Me touchez pas !

translation.en: -You're hurting me! -Quiet. Shut up, would you?
-No! I said no! -Shut up, you little bitch tease!
translation.fr: - J'ai dit non ! - Ta gueule, allumeuse !

translation.en: Sylvester, stop it! No!
-Quiet! Quiet! -Get off of me! No! I said no!
-What--? -Stop!
-Just tell me and I'll do anything. -Kiss me.
translation.fr: - Dites, je ferais n'importe quoi. - Embrasse-moi.

translation.en: -What? -I said kiss me.
What do you want?
-Professor Roberts, you're hurting me. -Give me that!
You don't have to do this. You don't have to do this.
What do you want? Okay, come on.
-I'll pay for it. All right, I'll pay for that. -Yes, you will.
translation.fr: Je paierai, d'accord. Oui, vous le paierez.

translation.en: Come on in.
Come on in. Hello.
Just take your seats, please. Welcome.
I'm Professor Jacobs and I'll be taking over the class... ...for the rest of the semester.
translation.fr: Je suis le Pr Jacobs, j'assurerai la suite des cours.

translation.en: What happened?
They're calling it a leave of absence, but I heard...
translation.fr: Il est soi-disant en congé. Mais le doyen aurait reçu

translation.en: ...someone sent the dean a recording of him hitting on a student.
translation.fr: Il est soi-disant en congé. Mais le doyen aurait reçu un enregistrement où il drague une élève.

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -Yeah, I know.
Well, that's what you call instant karma.
Okay, I have made a decision.
-You ready? -Yeah, let's hear it.
-I'm gonna quit the band. -What? Why?
It's a huge waste of time and we suck.
translation.fr: C'est qu'une perte de temps et on est naze.

translation.en: I disagree, but why would you say that?
translation.fr: Mais non, pourquoi tu dis ça ?

translation.en: All right, let me think about this.
The only places that we can get booked...
translation.fr: les seuls endroits où on joue

translation.en: ...are my frat house and my girlfriend's coffee shop.
translation.fr: sont mon assoce et le café de ma copine. Ça le fait pas.

translation.en: That's not good.
translation.fr: et le café de ma copine. Ça le fait pas.

translation.en: -Did you just say "my girlfriend"? -Oh, you heard me.
translation.fr: - T'as dit "ma copine" ? - T'as bien entendu.

translation.en: So do you think it'd be fun to stay here for Thanksgiving?
translation.fr: Ce serait sympa que je reste pour Thanksgiving ?

translation.en: Yeah, you know, you got dinner at the frat house, football games...
translation.fr: Il y a le dîner de l'assoce, des matchs de foot,

translation.en: ...and the always awkward homoerotic humor.
-That sounds like a blast. It's fun times. -Oh, yeah. It's very good.
A little awkward at times, but....
Rebecca. Oh, my God. What happened?
-What happened? -I was looking for Cuddles.
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qui s'est passé ? Dis-moi ! Je cherchais Câline,

translation.en: -A man pulled me into an alley. And he-- -Okay.
translation.fr: un homme m'a attirée dans une allée...

translation.en: -I got away, though. -Okay.
It's not deep, thank God.
You should see a doctor.
-No. -Rebecca, you need to.
translation.fr: Il le faut. Ensuite, va à la police.

translation.en: -And then the police. -No, I can't.
translation.fr: Il le faut. Ensuite, va à la police. Je peux pas.

translation.en: You're calling or I am. There is a psycho walking around.
translation.fr: Appelle ou je le fais. Il y a un malade ici.

translation.en: -Please, I didn't even see him. -It doesn't matter.
translation.fr: Je l'ai même pas vu. Peu importe, il faut avertir la police.

translation.en: You still need to talk to the police.
translation.fr: Peu importe, il faut avertir la police.

translation.en: Please. I only want you to know. -Rebecca. -Don't tell anybody, please.
translation.fr: Je veux que toi seule le saches. N'en parle à personne, je t'en prie.

translation.en: Okay, I won't tell them.
-Just let me help you. -Are you mad at me?
translation.fr: - Mais laisse-moi t'aider. - Tu m'en veux ?

translation.en: Why would I be mad at you?
Sorry again about not staying, but Rebecca....
translation.fr: Encore désolée de ne pas rester, mais Rebecca...

translation.en: No, I get it. I get it.
I'm just gonna make out with my pillow and pretend it's you anyway, so....
translation.fr: Je vais serrer mon oreiller comme si c'était toi.

translation.en: Just say you're gonna miss me.
translation.fr: Dis que je vais te manquer.

translation.en: I will miss you.
I'll miss you too.
You know, I haven't heard from Jason in weeks.
translation.fr: Pas de nouvelles de Jason depuis des semaines.

translation.en: It's weird how he stopped calling.
That's what you wanted, right?
Yeah, I guess it is.
This is your home?
This is my parents' house. It was never a home when I lived here.
translation.fr: Chez mes parents. Je m'y sens pas chez moi.

translation.en: Is anybody here?
-Hi. -Hi, honey.
-Oh, my God. What happened? -Mom, stop. Nothing.
-What do you mean? It's not nothing. -Leave it alone.
translation.fr: - Rien ? Ça n'est pas rien. - Oublie.

translation.en: We didn't think you'd make it. Why wouldn't I?
translation.fr: - On se demandait si tu viendrais. - Pourquoi ça ?

translation.en: And you are?
I'm Sara.
-Sara's my roommate. -Hi, I'm Jeff.
translation.fr: - Sara. - C'est ma coloc. Moi, c'est Jeff.

translation.en: -Nice to meet you. -Hi. Welcome. I'm Alison.
Come on, let me show you my room.
translation.fr: Viens, je te montre ma chambre.

translation.en: You didn't tell them we were coming?
translation.fr: Tu leur as pas dit qu'on venait ?

translation.en: They didn't need to know.
-Nice room. -I guess.
-Who is she? -That's just some high-school work.
translation.fr: - Qui est-ce ? - Ça date du lycée.

translation.en: I haven't gotten around to taking it down yet.
Sara, I hope you're not a vegetarian.
translation.fr: Sara, j'espère que vous n'êtes pas végétarienne.

translation.en: Oh, no, not at all.
-Rebecca's an awesome roommate. -That's nice to hear.
translation.fr: - Rebecca est une super colocataire. - Ça fait plaisir à entendre.

translation.en: I'm sure she likes you, because she's never brought anyone home before.
translation.fr: Elle doit bien vous aimer, elle n'a jamais amené personne.

translation.en: -Dad. -What?
As a parent, you worry.
translation.fr: En tant que parent, on s'inquiète.

translation.en: You protect your daughter all her life and then she goes off to college.
translation.fr: On protège sa fille toute sa vie et la voilà à la fac,

translation.en: And she's on her own. And you never know who she'll be exposed to.
translation.fr: toute seule, sans qu'on sache à qui elle aura affaire.

translation.en: Sara, we're going to make up a very nice room for you.
translation.fr: On va vous préparer une chambre.

translation.en: No, she'll stay with me.
translation.fr: Non, elle reste avec moi. D'accord ?

translation.en: Wonderful.
Bec. You scared me.
Why are you up so late?
-So how you doing? -I'm fine.
My grades are good.
That's not what I meant.
translation.fr: Je ne parlais pas de ça.

translation.en: I'm making friends.
Rebecca, look at me for a second.
-Your mother and I are very fond of you. -I know.
translation.fr: - Ta mère et moi t'adorons. - Je sais.

translation.en: All right, I'm gonna head on up to bed.
What are you up to?
Rebecca's gonna show me her high-school hangouts.
translation.fr: Rebecca me montre ses repaires de lycéenne.

translation.en: -Wonderful. -Yeah.
-Rebecca's doing really well. -She's doing good.
translation.fr: - Elle s'en sort très bien. - Oui, bien.

translation.en: She's taking her medication?
Medication?
Well, you girls have a wonderful time.
Come on.
Is everything okay?
It's just....
It's nice to see where you come from.
translation.fr: C'est chouette de voir d'où tu viens.

translation.en: Come on.
-This is the best. -Smells really good.
translation.fr: - C'est le meilleur. - Ça sent super bon.

translation.en: I used to come here, like, every day.
translation.fr: Je venais ici tous les jours.

translation.en: Do you know them?
That's the girl from your drawings.
Let's leave.
Hi, Maria.
I wanted to introduce you to Sara.
My roommate.
Maybe we should go.
We were never friends.
Come on, let's go.
Oh, good, Irene's back in town.
-Good run? -Great.
I'm going to the studio.
All right, I'll catch you later.
Don't wait up. I feel inspired.
translation.fr: M'attends pas, je me sens inspirée.

translation.en: I forgot my pad.
-You all right? -Yeah.
-What are those? -That's what I gotta find out.
translation.fr: - C'est quoi ? - C'est ce que je me demande.

translation.en: Can I help you out?
No. I'm fine.
Just doing my job.
-All done. -You have a little something.
translation.fr: J'ai fini. Vous avez un truc, là.

translation.en: -What the hell? -I'm sorry, Rick.
Sweetheart, it's okay. No harm, no--
translation.fr: Poupée, y a pas de mal...

translation.en: I'm so sorry again, Rick.
You spoiled bitch.
Be cool.
Pussy.
It says Zyprexa is used to treat the symptoms of psychotic conditions...
translation.fr: Zyprexa est utilisé en cas d'états psychotiques

translation.en: ...such as schizophrenia and bipolar disorder.
translation.fr: tels que la schizophrénie et les troubles bipolaires.

translation.en: I just thought she was weird.
Maybe this is a refill. Maybe she's been taking them the whole time.
translation.fr: Si c'était une réserve ? Elle les prend peut-être.

translation.en: Yeah, I don't think she's ever taken them.
translation.fr: Je pense qu'elle les a jamais pris.

translation.en: I think it's time to move in with Irene.
Sorry to stare...
...but you're really beautiful.
So are you.
You have great lips. What kind is that?
translation.fr: Quelle jolie bouche. C'est quoi comme parfum ?

translation.en: Cinnamon. Caffeinated.
A girl never knows how late she's gonna party.
translation.fr: On sait jamais quand la fête s'arrête.

translation.en: Can I try?
You're right. Cinnamon.
I would invite you back to my place, but I have a roommate.
translation.fr: Je vous inviterais bien chez moi, mais j'ai une coloc.

translation.en: Well, as luck would have it, I'm only a few blocks away...
translation.fr: Le hasard fait bien les choses, j'habite pas loin.

translation.en: ...and I don't.
What are we waiting for?
It's Irene. Please leave a message.
-Where were you all night? -I was at the studio.
translation.fr: - Tu étais où, cette nuit ? - A l'atelier.

translation.en: I got inspired, so....
I just lost track of time.
translation.fr: J'ai perdu la notion du temps.

translation.en: -Rebecca-- -I want a tattoo.
-What? -A tattoo.
Will you come with me?
Please? I don't think I could do it without you.
translation.fr: S'il te plaît. Je pourrai pas sans toi.

translation.en: I know what I want.
translation.fr: Je sais ce que je veux.

translation.en: -I'll wait here. -Okay.
All done.
Let's see it.
You can think of me as your sister.
Well, what's the matter?
You can call me Emily if you want.
-That's all you're bringing? -I'll get the rest when Irene comes back.
translation.fr: - C'est tout ? - En attendant qu'Irene rentre.

translation.en: -Where's your necklace? -I can't find it. It's okay.
translation.fr: - Et ton collier ? - Je l'ai pas trouvé.

translation.en: -Sara. -Stephen, I don't wanna go back there.
I'm gonna go look for it.
Have you seen Sara's necklace?
translation.fr: T'as vu le collier de Sara ?

translation.en: What did I do?
She just needs to move on. You know?
translation.fr: Elle a besoin de passer à autre chose.

translation.en: With you?
If you find the necklace, just let me know. All right?
translation.fr: Si tu trouves le collier, fais-moi signe.

translation.en: You do shit like that.
translation.fr: Tu fais ce genre de connerie.

translation.en: Have a good one.
We should call someone.
Like the dean's office, or at least your R.A.
translation.fr: Le bureau du doyen ou votre surveillante.

translation.en: And tell them what? She hasn't done anything to me.
translation.fr: Pour leur dire quoi ? Elle m'a rien fait.

translation.en: That girl's own parents are afraid of her.
translation.fr: Même ses parents ont peur d'elle.

translation.en: -She sure scared the shit out of me. -Are these clean or dirty?
translation.fr: - Y a pas que ses parents. - Propre ou sale ?

translation.en: Somewhere in between, maybe.
-Did you take this? -No. I don't think so.
translation.fr: - C'est toi qui as pris ça ? - Non, je crois pas.

translation.en: Is that not yours?
That's enough. I'm returning this, and you gotta do something.
translation.fr: Ça suffit. Je le rapporte. Préviens quelqu'un.

translation.en: No. I don't want you to go back there.
translation.fr: Je veux pas que tu y retournes.

translation.en: Hey, it's Sara. Leave a message.
Hey, Sara. It's Jason.
I'm actually in front of your dorm. I just flew in.
translation.fr: Je suis devant ta résidence. Je viens d'atterrir.

translation.en: Look, I'm at the Rosewell Hotel, Room 210.
translation.fr: Je suis au Rosewell Hotel, chambre 210.

translation.en: Call me, okay?
I'm going to the library.
-I can walk you. -It's okay.
-Are you sure? -Yep.
Well, the party starts at 10. I did hear that there is a great band playing.
translation.fr: La fête commence à 22 h. Et il y aura un super groupe.

translation.en: -I thought you said they suck. -They're getting better, you know?
-I hear the drummer's really hot. -He is.
translation.fr: - Et le batteur est canon. - C'est vrai.

translation.en: But I'm sleeping with his girlfriend.
translation.fr: Mais je couche avec sa copine.

translation.en: -I'll see you later. -Okay.
What?
You got my voice mail.
I'm glad you came.
translation.fr: Je suis content que tu sois venue.

translation.en: That feels good.
Turn over.
Close your eyes.
Oh, I missed your smell.
I love you so much.
translation.fr: C'est dingue ce que je t'aime.

translation.en: She doesn't love you.
Hey, it's me. Irene needs me and she's not answering her phone.
translation.fr: C'est moi. Irene a besoin de moi et elle décroche pas.

translation.en: And I'm really worried. Will you meet me there, please?
translation.fr: Je suis inquiète. Tu veux bien me rejoindre ?

translation.en: 524 South Grand. Okay. Bye.
Irene?
-What are you doing? -Sit down and shut up.
translation.fr: - Qu'est-ce que tu fais ? - Assieds-toi et ferme-la.

translation.en: Listen to me.
All I ever wanted was to be your friend. -Rebecca, I am your friend. -No, you're not.
translation.fr: - Je voulais seulement qu'on soit amies. - Mais je suis ton amie.

translation.en: -Yes, I am. -No. You're not!
translation.fr: - C'est pas vrai. - Si ! C'est pas vrai ! On est ici parce que tu m'as trahie.

translation.en: We're here because you betrayed me.
translation.fr: C'est pas vrai ! On est ici parce que tu m'as trahie.

translation.en: -Rebecca, I'm your friend. -Stop!
Stop saying things you don't mean!
translation.fr: Ne dis pas ce que tu ressens pas !

translation.en: I protected you!
I protected you against that whore Tracy...
translation.fr: Je t'ai protégée contre cette pute de Tracy,

translation.en: ...and that nasty little kitten...
translation.fr: Je t'ai protégée contre cette pute de Tracy, cette saleté de chaton,

translation.en: ...that scumbag of a professor...
...even that loser ex-boyfriend of yours!
translation.fr: et même contre ton ex minable.

translation.en: -What did you do to him? -I got rid of them all for you!
translation.fr: - Tu lui as fait quoi ? - Je les ai tous éliminés pour toi !

translation.en: And how do you repay me? By leaving me!
translation.fr: Et tu me remercies en me laissant tomber !

translation.en: Rebecca, please forgive me.
I'm sorry. I am so sorry. From the bottom of my heart.
translation.fr: Je suis désolée, vraiment. Du fond du cœur, pardonne-moi.

translation.en: Please forgive me.
I forgive you.
Now we can start all over again.
Just like that first day.
-What is that? -Just the two of us together.
translation.fr: - C'est quoi ? - Rien que nous deux,

translation.en: Because I only want you...
translation.fr: ensemble. Je veux que tu n'aies qu'une meilleure amie.

translation.en: -...to have one best friend. -No! No! No!
translation.fr: Je veux que tu n'aies qu'une meilleure amie.

translation.en: -Rebecca! Rebecca, don't! -Lay still, bitch.
Stay away! Don't come any closer.
I'm sorry. I'm so sorry.
-The fire escape! -I just want to be your friend!
translation.fr: - L'escalier de secours ! - Je veux être ton amie !

translation.en: -I can't leave you! -Go to the window.
-Shit! -No, Sara!
Sara! Open it, please!
-Sara! -I can't reach it! It's too far!
-Sara, go! Get out! -Sara!
-Sara! -Oh, God. It's too far.
Everything is gonna be okay!
Help me!
Help!
-Come on, come on, come on. -Get me up!
-Give me your hand. -Pull me in!
Sara! Look out!
I swear to God...
-...I will shoot you, Rebecca. -You won't do it.
translation.fr: - je vais te tuer. - T'oseras pas.

translation.en: You were never my friend.
-Welcome back. -Hi.
You know, you can move in with me if you want.
I don't think I want a roommate for a while.
-Dinner tonight, maybe? -Absolutely.
But before you go, do you want to help me with a little something?
translation.fr: Avant de partir, donne-moi un coup de main.

translation.en: Get out of here.
See you later.
